body_html:
I got the right reason for this issue.
Currently, bazel does not support coverage for python test codes.
And some people got it working now for C++.

Replied as below

Python, definitely not. C++, some people got it working, but it's
best-effort at the moment.

body:
I got the right reason for this issue.
Currently, bazel does not support `coverage` for python test codes.
And some people got it working now for C++.

Replied as below
```
Python, definitely not. C++, some people got it working, but it's
best-effort at the moment.
```
